00029 class cepError;

00031 /******************************************************************************
00032 DOCBOOK START
00033 
00034 FUNCTION cepDatasetProgressCB
00035 PURPOSE report progress on dataset parsing to the calling method
00036 
00037 SYNOPSIS START
00038 typedef void (*cepDatasetProgressCB) (int plane, long lineno);
00039 SYNOPSIS END
00040 
00041 DESCRIPTION START
00042 This type is used to define a callback function which will be called whenever a line has been read from the dataset files. <command>plane</command> will the plane that the line belongs to (for example: x, y, and z) and <command>lineno</command> is the line number for the current dataset file.
00043 DESCRIPTION END
00044 
00045 SEEALSO cepDataset
00046 DOCBOOK END
00047 ******************************************************************************/
00048 
00049 typedef void (*cepDatasetProgressCB) (int plane, long lineno);

00052 typedef struct cep_internal_datarow
00053 {
00055   float date;
00057   float sample;
00059   float error;
00060 }
00061 cep_datarow;

00063 // This is used for the 'columns' in the windowing algorithm
00064 typedef vector < cep_datarow > cep_datacol;
